modName: No -My Thane- dialog with married Housecarl
summary: Married Housecarl no longer reffer you as Thane.
descriptionHtml:
You may want to check this file that already contains this mod:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23180/

Married Housecarl no longer reffer you as Thane.
Modifies a marriage script to remove housecarl (wife) from the Housecarl Faction this happens after 24 hours gametime now.

Install: Just copy the files, to the correct folder. Better if using a mod manager to uninstall easily and avoid problems.
author: nb77
